ek paththakin rate swairi bhawaya ,eekiyabhawaya pilibanda prashnayaki.me athara ranawiruwanta erehiwa eeniya yudha aparadha pilibanda usawi ,nithi hadena wakawanuwaki.thawath paththakin upadhidharinta rajaye rakiya labaganimata athi prashnayaki.anith paththen wi gowiyata,wawili karuwanta siya wagawan wikunagatha nohakiwa lathaweth.me siyallehima chodanawa enne pawathina aanduwataya.namuth me aanduwa path wi aththe eewata wisandum dimata wada demala janathawata siduwuna yayi kiyana eeniya asadharanayakata wisandum dimataya.ebawin anek dawena prashna yatagasa wadakata nathi yalpanagiya prashna karaliyata gena eyi.pasugiyada sidu wu eeniya udghoshanayata sisun bahutharaya pamina aththe yam yam balakirim mathaya.anthare wada karanne katadayi anura kumara apata kiya diya yuthu natha.anura kumara wada karanne katadayi ranil wikramasinha apata kiya diya yuthu natha.swadhina kala yayi kiyana polisiya wada karanne kage anatadayi thawamath nodanne yahapalana toyiyan pamanaki.
maru maru liyanna thawa yaksha katha.

magasin bandhanagara radawiyekuta amanushika lesa pahara di guda margaye jangama durakathanayak sangawa thaba ganime chodanawata sambandha ayata winishchaya mandalaya magin masa hayaka barapathala wada sahitha siradadumak laba dime siddhiya sambandhayen sathi dekak athulatha di parikshanayak pawathwa waha adhikaranayata warthawak idiripath karana lesata rahas polisiye adhyakshakata kolambaa athireka mahesthrath praharsha ranasinha mahathmiya eeye (18) niyama kalaya.siddhiya sambandhayen bandhanagaraya wisin adhikaranayata sawadya lekhana idiripath kara athi bawa pawasu mahesthrathwariya radawiyata batan pollakin pahara di athi bawata rajaye adhikarana waidya wartha anuwa thahawuru wana bawath, ohuge guda margaye jangama durakathanayak sangawa thibu bawata salakunu nomathi bawata waidya wartha thahawuru karana bawath pawasuwaya.bandhanagara rohal waidya niladharini adhikaranayata idiripath kala waidya warthawe paraspara wirodhi saha asathya thorathuru athi bawin rajaye adhikarana waidya niladhariwaraya haraha nawatha waidya warthawak kadawu bawa pawasu mahesthrathwariya mema siddhiya rahas polisiyata bara dena bawata sadahan kalaya.siddhiya eeye nawatha kadawu awasthawe di ehi parikshana rahas polisiyata bara dun mahesthrathwariya mese da prashna kalaya.mahesthrathwariya - thama sathu welum pati ko ?sakakaru - swamini , welum pati adhikariwaraya gaththa .mahesthrathwariya - kohomada gaththe, liyakiyawili matha athsan karala da ?sakakaru - kisi ma liyakiyawillaka athsan gaththe naha.mahesthrathwariya - durakathanayak , guda margaye thiya gaththa kiyala pol gedi akurin paththare dala, masa 6k achchu karala ,monawada me asadharana siddhi.nithignya prasad silwa - swamini sorakam naduwen obathumiya sakakaru nidos kara thiyenawa.mahesthrathwariya - sakki nathi nisa nidahas kala.
